Our goal is to match demand and offer of expertise, so that it can be transferred directly from the skilled person (the expert) to anyone in search for help (the seeker). We call this process sharing session. The session starts with a preliminary negotiation phase, during which requirements and eventual costs are discussed. Then, if this step is successful, the expert and the seeker organize a meeting, typically a video call, during which the expert will try to address the seeker’s requirements.
For further information about our service, we suggest you to read our official guide. The Knowhub guide contains every detail about how our service works and its limitations, and represents an integral part of these terms of service.
